EmailTemplate.subject: Result of your interview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Result of your interview
Dear [contact name],
As you know, you have been offered a job with [Employer] as [job name]. As you have decided not to accept this job offer it will now be offered to another Associate and you will no longer be eligible for this role.
Please note that we cannot guarantee you further interviews with Step Forward. However, if a suitable position becomes available we will contact you by email.
We want to provide you with some really solid feedback that you can use for your future development.
The people at [Employer] said that you performed well in the following areas:
[positive feedback from salesforce if score is agree / strongly agree].
The employer said that your clothes were perfectly suited to the interview and that your introduction was excellent. The employer said you were well prepared for the interview, both in terms of your understanding of the role and of the company.
They suggest areas of development are:
[developmental feedback from salesforce if score is disagree / strongly disagree].
The employer said that your verbal communication skills required further improvement. You could improve on this by reviewing your CV and planning how you would answer questions about each section. Also, remember to not to be anxious as the main aim of the interview is to assess whether the placement would be suitable for you.
In the meantime, please reply to stepforward.interview@the-challenge.org if you have any questions.
All the best,
Step Forward Matching Team
020 3542 2404. Option 5.
